title: Sci-fi Mercenary
description: low poly monster model for extras in your game
longDescription: The model is made according to the identical dimensions of the mannequin (all joints of the shoulder of the finger and the rest are the same size as the mannequin), which makes it possible to use all standard animations without any distortion. The model is also modular, has 3 sets of unique textures
